summary: Diff adds a new authenticated admin story-creation page, wires it into routing under /admin/story/new, adds a header navigation link for authenticated users, and implements a React Query mutation that calls backend addStory and invalidates story queries.

hallucinated_features.description: After successfully creating a story, the admin page auto-navigates to the homepage after a 1.5s delay (and shows a success message).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest/AC did not ask for automatic redirect behavior after creation; it only required refetching lists and showing errors.

hallucinated_features.description: Client-side generation of an excerpt from the first 150 characters of the full content before calling addStory.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not specify excerpt creation logic; only Title, Category, and Full story text were requested as form fields.
